name: Cavern Run! [BETA]
description:
🟥 You are stuck inside an abandoned cave that is riddled with spikes and dangerous enemies! Run your way through the cave in order to survive!
🟥 Be careful though! The speed of the game increases every 10 seconds, so be quick!
🟥 You can check your score at the top left corner of the screen!
🟥 You can also check your coins at the bottom left corner of the screen!
🟥 Collect coins to buy cool skins! [ONLY ONE FOR NOW]

🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥

    🟥Controls!🟥

🟥 A/D or LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS to move around!
🟥 W or UP ARROW to jump!

🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥

     🟥Tips & Tricks🟥

🟥 TAKE YOUR TIME! Since the speed of the game increases every 10 seconds, you want to make sure you are not moving too much and try to stay in one place while jumping.
🟥 COINS ARE NOT EVERYTHING! If your main goal is to collect coins, STOP! It will only make you die more times than you want. Only collect coins when YOU KNOW you are safe from spikes and enemies.

🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥

      🟥Credits & Links🟥

🟥 Music: Nebula by ?.
🟥All art and code by me, made in Scratch!
🟥Learn more about me here: https://resite.link/KrazyKernel
🟥 Follow me on Scratch!: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/KrazyKernel

🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥

  🟥Bonus🟥

🟥 This game took me about a week to make. The reason why is because I took a break from making it to focus on updating my platformer [Stuntz].
🟥 If you enjoy playing my games, please consider following me and rating my games! It helps let me know that people are enjoying and playing my games and motivates me to make more!
🟥As always, feedback is much appreciated! (JUST MAKE SURE IT IS CONSTRUCTIVE CRITICISM IF YOU DISLIKE IT!)

🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥🟥
